metadata.name: Deux Écrivains: First Edition
metadata.created_by: Fine Art Curators of Tomorrow LLC
metadata.description:
Deux Écrivains: First Edition, by A Ryder, is a 1/1 ERC-721 book and experience. It is the start of our journey. Follow the Ryder family as you collect clues to find Mr. Ryder. Once Mr. Ryder is found, the book will be completed and minted as a separate 1/1 book. Click and drag or use the arrow keys to turn the page. Enhance your webpage's zoom to read comfortably or  
download Deux Écrivains: Second Edition as an EPUB at: 
www. WhereIsMrRyder.com.

attributes.value: Fine Art Curators of Tomorrow LLC
